website_summaries.verdict: This looks like a simple alarm clock, but it's actually a well-hidden high definition camera that can capture footage from a desk or table.
pros: Functions and looks like an alarm clock so it's very inconspicuous
Connects to the internet for limitless mobile viewing and control using a smartphone or tablet
Trim design doesn't take up a lot of space
cons: Instructions that come with it could be better, which doesn't help the fact that it's a bit challenging to set up

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as indicated great picture quality easy to use very covert as nobody knows this is anything other than a small digital clock. Very easy insulation and night vision is pretty good as well I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the picture. I would definitely highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a undetectable camera for their home I use it to keep an eye on my pets. The seller is very easy to work with and will answer any and all questions and stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Discreet, compact, and works really well.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to keep an eye on caretaker for my grandfather after small things started to missing. The set up was bit difficult because I am not very tech savvy, but was able to go online on their website and was able to get step by step manual. After reading, I was able to set it up and have it running in less than 15 minutes. Camera is small and discreet, unless you’re looking in directly under direct sunlight, you won’t be able to see the camera. The reflective lens over the camera makes it difficult to for unsuspecting to see. I love that once set up, I’m able to watch the feed live from anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Wiif nightmare.
customer_reviews.text: Its a nightmare to put online. Still trying to put it on line , And I have not succeeded.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase. I will definitely purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.text: Received my clock/camera yesterday. Great picture; good resolution and easy to connect to WiFi. Working great and I am happy with this purchase. You would never think that this clock has a hidden camera. Very stealth. Make sure you charge/plug in for awhile before attempting to connect to your WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: cathy a stella

customer_reviews.title: Great little clock/camera
customer_reviews.text: Clock is exactly what I was looking for. Very small sits perfect on my desk doesn't take up much room at all. Picture is very clear and has a wide angle view which picks up most of the room. Love that I can view a live feed anywhere I'm at. Very easy installation it actually only took me one attempt to get it going. I also like the motion sensor it has, picks up very well. Still messing around with it to take full advantage of this great little clock/camera. Seller was very easy to work with and answered all my questions I had. I'm actually thinking about getting one more. Great little investment!
customer_reviews.author: phatboyee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality picture but motion sensor not working
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is good, you can also live view in the app, you can also directly connect to the device using its own wifi. However, the motion detection is really bad. You turn on the motion detection in the app, then it suppose to record every motion with a video, however, it only record 2 days then it stop working. The live view is still working but motion recording is not. Clock works fine and you can't really see the camera from looking at it. Overall it is a working live camera but not doing 100% of what it advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Liliane C

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The clock is so cute. It’s impossible to see the inside camera. I put it up on the fireplace so I can view my whole living room. I like the idea of using SD card, so I don’t have to depend on the WiFi all the time. The picture is clear. Customer service is excellent! I always got very quick courtesy responses texts from them.
customer_reviews.author: shopper02

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the price! Fits in the palm of your hand and can be overlooked by a potential intruder. It has a 4k, 1080P option for your choosing. Also, one can install and monitor four cameras from your cell phone. Takes a few minutes to get familiar with the setup but once your figure it out--you'll be set. Finally, the seller went out of his way to ensure that I was good to go and provided assistance even if I didn't ask for it. Well worth the buy and dialogue with seller.
customer_reviews.author: mandgr2005

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I expected a bigger unit but this is perfect and compact (6x4x3) and runs on a rechargable battery. Easy to connect to WIFI and looking to see if I can remote connect from outside the WIFI range. Completely concealed and covert. Comes with 16g microSD inside. Perfect unit for any application. Grab this while you can and i need another.
customer_reviews.author: Livewire

customer_reviews.title: Value for your Dollar!
customer_reviews.text: 1. Simple set-up, download app contact to device signal (wifi) then connect to your wifi. Device is ready to go! 2. Best part, customer service, contact them via text, response time was immediate. 3. Small Business - support small business platform. 4. Make sure to read dimensions, smaller then expected, but prefer the current size, so it worked out well. 5. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Celia Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Revert my previous comments.
customer_reviews.text: it's not works as expected, I expected video and audio recording as two way as per product description but it works only for Video not for audio, and one more false statement is in this received package they mentioned to send SMS to specific contact No. 9292620472 to receive one more free device with Audio recording. for that customer support team asked me to give positive feedback about this device before sending a order tracking no. i did so... but finally not yet all responding. i got disappointed. so changing my feed back. They are not loyal as what they have committed.
customer_reviews.author: Rathi

customer_reviews.title: Horrible and very cheap
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this cheap camera back to Amazon and got a refund cause I connected it all up and it would be online one minute and off the next, the picture quality was awful, only half the numbers on the alarm clock lit up, and it got super hot! Do not waste your money on this cheap camera
customer_reviews.author: kjt 84

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money, this Clock is Smaller than a Candy Bar
customer_reviews.text: The clock is too small. It won't stay logged into WiFi. And if you leave home or if you're not in close proximity to the clock, the camera goes offline. It took about 30 minutes for the camera to sync with my mobile phone even after following the directions. Almost as if the camera server was delayed in responding to the request. Waste of money. Night vision is a joke, it does not work. If the lights are off in a room, you cannot see anything, even if you use the feature to brighten the film.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gatson

customer_reviews.title: Convoluted Instructions/No Customer Support, DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Simply put - Look somewhere else 1. Reset did not work at all, which if you can't do....you can't continue set up 2. Customer Support says 24/7 which is a complete and utter lie 3. The instructions rely on third party software which is independent of this company...which means their instructions were useless... DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: small discreet clock,  with camera
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Download the pdf of the manual. It's well written and clear. Be sure to choose a 2.4 GHZ network. Once done, it worked great. I also texted with tech support, they were fast, clear and accurate
customer_reviews.author: thomas g bongiorno

customer_reviews.title: It works and no one will have a clue it's there.
customer_reviews.text: Great hidden camera! It works, which is a lot better than another I tried...that one ended up going back. This one was fairly easy to set up and has a decent picture, except the color is a bit off. In any event, I can make sure there are no college kids partying at my house when I am away!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small/discreet
customer_reviews.text: Camera is small and you can not tell there is camera! Fits perfect in the space that we need it for. Easy setup and if needed fast response from tech support. Haven’t used the night vision feature yet, but picture quality remotely works perfect as long as connected to wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve done on amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking into a camera for my apartment. Can I just say I found the one? This camera has everything you need for a hidden camera! Simple to follow yet very helpful when you aren’t home to see what’s going on! I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Shorty

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a security system for my apartment, and this did exactly what I needed! I get notifications whenever there is movement detected, and I can automatically see the live feed. For the money, this product is very very good! The night vision also works very well. If you are away from your home a lot and looking for a way to feel secure, this is definitely the product for you!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: II ordered this camera to check on my elderly mother. It works as expected and I can make sure she is ok. You cannot tell in any way that it is a camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE CONNECTION
customer_reviews.text: I THOUGHT this product was amazing when i first plugged it up and got it set up. camera is amazing. however the clock itself is abnormally small for a clock. my issue with this product is the reason i gave it a one star. once connected it was great. but my phone and this device was both connected to the wifi. once i left i could not view anything on the app. it kept saying no connection and i could not view any live stream. so i ended up getting a waymoon brand and it amazing. highly recommend the waymoon clock cam over this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Camera stop after 2months
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money purchased this in February, it was working good at first 4 months after the purchase it going out do not keep the correct time, could get the camera to work, it's now flashing like it's going out. 50 dollars it and I have even had it s year and it on its way out. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great hidden gem
customer_reviews.text: This is great hidden camera luv it...noone will know its a camera u have there and the picture quality is great.. was having difficulty setting it up and the phone # provided was so helpful they answere matteres of mins got me to fix and get on w my recordings.its a must have
customer_reviews.author: edith7

customer_reviews.title: Impressive High Quality.  Easy set-up.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed by this high quality Hidden Camera Alarm Clock which came with all the accessories necessary for super easy set- up. Area covered is wide enough to cover two entry doors to my home (Living Room and Kitchen). Built-in battery is rechargeable. Great product at a great price. Very happy with my purchase and will recommend it to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s an amazing product! However it does take some patience and time to get it to sync to your phone and Wi-Fi connection. If you search the model on YouTube it will definitely make your life much easier with that process. Other than that this is an amazing device!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShoppingDAD

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The video quality is absolutely amazing! It works so well!! It’s in my kitchen and looks amazing!! You can’t even tell it’s a camera! I’ve very happy with this product! Also, it’s not that complicated to set up! The support team is very VERY friendly and I’m very glad to have them!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Bouwens

customer_reviews.title: Quality products
customer_reviews.text: The image even at 720P is outstanding. So far so good. I had the older version. The older had a more mirrored screen. This one you can see the lens if you know what you're looking for. However, the blue light from the clock makes it hard to pay attention to. The 'Set' 'Plus' buttons allow you to manually set the time, in 24Hr format. The app is also user-friendly, you can put multiple cameras on the 1 app.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing!! I set The camera up as well as downloaded the app in less than 7 minutes. I’m amazed. Over tried one other camera before and this one BY FAR surpasses the quality of the last. The quality of the camera picture is super clear as well. I’m stoked.
customer_reviews.author: Nore

customer_reviews.title: Loved the product!
customer_reviews.text: The device works perfectly. The night light works sufficiently and the app was really easy to set up. I had all the necessary information to remote into the device and see its video and live feed easily I’m IT for my school and I was expecting something complicated as usual, but this was not the case. Also being informed once you set up the Wi-Fi is a must that it delivers. Also it’s a working clock. Although note, the app won’t work if you need to enter a user name for the Wi-Fi. Make sure you have a guest or password only Wi-Fi on in order for this app to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: No one will ever know!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera! Everyone assumes it’s just a clock, the app gives clear pictures & up to date notifications
customer_reviews.author: DSC44

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: Now we need home security surveillance cameras more than ever. This spy camera is the best choice for me. First, they provide free WiFi for you to set up along with an APP for you to view, record and save your data. Second, the quality of the camera is good and its wide angle lens allows you to see more detail in the room in real time. In addition, I can't say enough about their customer service. I have always said I would buy from them again in a heartbeat as long as they remain committed to that level of support.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a good hidden camera this is it! Trust me I’ve tried numerous cameras from a variety of makers; however, after a week of working remotely they suddenly stopped. I finally found a pot of gold when I purchased this one! It works consistently and the customer service is very responsive! I’m so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Little Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Grandmother, after some items in her home started to "disappear". It was pretty simple to set up and is very easy to use. The camera is much smaller than I expected, which is great. It fits will into any area and is very discreet. Image quality is really good. So far, it is working great!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Le

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We just recieved this hidden camera clock and we couldnt be more excited about it!!!! Its small bright perfectly sized customer service is great. Has built in memory and a place for a sd memory card. This is exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre video quality, no audio even to Card
customer_reviews.text: When it worked, the quality was fairly poor compared to other similar priced spy cams. The clock light is wayyyy too bright and disturbs at night if placed in a bedroom. The reset button broke in mine after first attempt to switch router, disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Naydee P.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice little ccamera clock
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Compact, clean ,good quality camera - Good quality video - Cannot detect the presence of a camera - Many features in the app including multiple recording options - Rechargeable battery is a great feature - Comes with really nice mini tools - Really good customer service Cons - No alarm option - Requires some effort to set it up( more than i prefer for a camera)
customer_reviews.author: Dulith Abeykoon

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: This product literally fell apart within its first couple hours of use. The face of it and the screen fell off. Then it just stopped working and it shut off and/ or froze. We returned this and got the wyze cam pan. It's not a hidden camera but it works so amazingly! Only $38, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Small.  Very tiny and decent spycam / clock
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on schedule and is as promised. The picture quality with light is nice. In the dark with night vision on can’t see anything. I set up lotion and alerts but have not had any luck with either working. Recording and taking photos manually works great. There also seems to be some storage even without the micro SD card. Recommended the product to a roommate!
customer_reviews.author: Ebaylion

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hidden camera, crappy app.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Texted the number from the card in the box to get the user manual and the audio turned on. Got a very quick response and they helped me every step of the way. Very very pleased with everything about this product. Cannot tell at all it's a camera. The app on the other hand needs serious work. After checking the SD card video and reinserting it, the app doesn't recognize the camera. Even after resetting the camera, installing and reinstalling the app. Haven't contacted product customer service yet, still a little frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup. Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to get setup, just took a few minutes. It also has a very wide field of view to capture all entry points to the room. Keeps good time too :)
customer_reviews.author: Ralphie L

customer_reviews.title: A little complicated but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I found the documentation for setup a little complicated. If you are someone that generally struggles with technology, this product may prove challenging to set-up as there are a lot of settings to work through. Also the application for your phone, you are pretty much on your own as far as figuring it out. That said, the product does seem to work as advertised. One suggestion I would make is to make it such that you can plug the clock directly into a computer in order to pull the video off, rather than having to remove the sd card each time.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: If you need a hidden camera , look no further!
customer_reviews.text: We have had an incredible experience with the two cameras we purchased. It was a little tough getting them up and running but we love having the ability to have multiple feeds throughout the house. So grateful for the A+ customer service we have received!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon W.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This item was shipped lightening fast. It's a very small clock but don't let it's small size fool you. It's packed with a very good high tech camera. The video quality is excellent, I am very impressed. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great Clock/Camera for Undetectable Surveillance
customer_reviews.text: What a great little clock/camera. Looks simply like a clock, so it’s perfect for home surveillance while you’re away. Picture quality and color is fantastic! Night vision leaves a bit to be desired concerning the distance of the IR lights’ effect, but that’s a minor issue for my purposes. Actually liked it so much that I bought a total of 4 for whole house coverage.
customer_reviews.author: vinegarjoe37

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Clock with extras!
customer_reviews.text: Came in very nice packaging. Easy to setup and use. Need to download the app in order to use all of its potential. Impressed so far. Will provide updates as time passes. Would recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: BTARBOX

customer_reviews.title: Small, modern, goes with any room design
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I wanted something small and discreet that didn’t necessarily look like a camera so that I could monitor my room while I am away. Plus, I love how small and modern it is, which helps it go with a design of any room. Not to mention, the customer service for this product was super responsive and helpful in my questions in helping me get it set up (there is a digital guide which is also great)!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and excellent customer support
customer_reviews.text: This clock doubles as a perfect hidden camera and provides great clarity and color. I love how it is in real time and allows audio and video taping. I will be definitely be purchasing a second one.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera and great service
customer_reviews.text: Best customer service experience I've had in a long time. I liked my first camera so much that I got a 2nd one. I was having issues setting it up so I called tech support. About 10 minutes later all was good. (things work best when you download the right app). The staff was friendly, knowledgeable, and professional, and a great example of how customers should be treated.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell M. Holley

customer_reviews.title: Great hidden camera for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I like that it can be used with multiple cameras I don’t fully understand the longevity of the battery so I just keep I plugged in, I’m able to go where I want and look at what’s going on in my home via phone. The picture quality is ok and the night vision as well for what its being sold for mic is good too
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little camera! Very discreet. The clock itself is the size of the palm of your hand. Does a good job keeping an eye on things when you're not around.
customer_reviews.author: Just an honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Put my money back into my bank account
customer_reviews.text: I can't get this to work!! When I look it up it said something about a recall on this and the little stand that suppose to come with it wasn't there. It looks like it was used and I'm not paying 52 dollars for something used!!! I want my money back!! I don't have a gift card so put my money back into my banking account please before I call Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for this clock camera!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mother and tried setting it up after an extremely long day. I couldn’t figure it out so the next day I called the number on the paperwork and the representative was so helpful and had it up and running within 1 minute! The camera is so clear and works great! Thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L. Mousley

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap and bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I received it today. Sound and microphone did not worked at all. Returning it. Cam is also my opinion overpriced for the quality that offers.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Nice little security camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little security camera, the picture quality is amazing. The small size fits anywhere. Nice bright led for the time.
customer_reviews.author: Snucifora

customer_reviews.title: Very great product!
customer_reviews.text: The cam have pretty decent vídeo quality and do exactly what is advertised. Wish hace a little bit more FPS, so the imagen move smoother but for the price I can't complain. Tech support is the best experience I have in a long time for now. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Spartan

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright looks good. Very small
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I like the customer service. The clock was not difficult to set up in used my phone to create the network. I will test video quality in a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Rockie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little Clock\Camera, it's clean looking, small and the picture quality is great. It could use a little help with the night vision but other than that it's a great little tool.
customer_reviews.author: Julie E.

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, good quality and easy to use online
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality camera. Better than expected in terms of night vision, which is really most important for security anyway. The setup was far easier than similar products. It took about three minutes. Connecting to wifi took about 20 seconds. Overall, from opening to operating, it took about five minutes. The cloud element is key because the SD card isn’t even necessary as well. Good product on the whole.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan K.

customer_reviews.title: Great little clock/cam
customer_reviews.text: Small, clean look and excellent customer support. Quick response on questions via SMS texts. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joejanney

customer_reviews.title: This camera is a really cool gadget to own!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the way the camera works, it comes with an easy step by step manual, the app is simple and organized so you don't find yourself confused, and the functionality for the price is great! The camera records in 1080p and looks quite clean and the size is nice as well not taking up much space. If you're looking for a spy cam to just have peace of mind when you're not home I highly recommend this camera !!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Song

customer_reviews.title: What your looking for is what you will get
customer_reviews.text: Amazing !! I am a real person with a very real experince lol this cam records no problem you CAN get audio, the tech support easily picked up and guiding me right threw I have returned so many cams bc of mislead descriptions . This one is definitely a keeper, and most importantly it actually looks like a real clock. Thank you Amazon and thank you tech support for all the patience "Great product"
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great technical support
customer_reviews.text: I needed some help setting this camera up. The tech support was wonderful and very pleasant to work with. I still need to explore the camera but at first glance it looks to be just what I need! Thanks again to the tech support folks! Joe Hildreth
customer_reviews.author: William Hildreth

customer_reviews.title: App not available
customer_reviews.text: App does not show up in app store. No way to download and connect.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: When i ordered this I was expecting a clock size device but its smaller and easier to move and hide in open spaces. The camera itself gives a very clear picture and it's easy to take screenshots from the app on your mobile device. The only thing i did not like is the initial set up I had a small hiccup but was able to get through it and afterwards it was easy sailing. I would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin leonard

customer_reviews.title: The perfect nanny cam
customer_reviews.text: The product works flawlessly. It comes in a nicely packaged box. Extremely easy to set up. I set up everything including the remote viewing through the app in 5 mins. Didn't have a single problem setting it up. The night vision and quality of video is crisp in 1080 or 4k. The app is easy to navigate and well thought out. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Crab

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced product and the software app didn't even work. I returned it the same day I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia K

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this camera clock!
customer_reviews.text: I received this camera clock today, and was surprised by how easy it is to set up. Picture quality is great, the clock looks just like a digital clock, and appears very stealthy. Night vision is excellent for those that need it. I was also pleasantly surprised by how easy it was to view the camera on my phone. I highly recommend purchasing this clock, and I'm already looking forward to buying another!
customer_reviews.author: J. Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Best item yet
customer_reviews.text: Had a few problems that we had to troubleshoot. Customer service was great and help me til it worked like it was suppose too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sartin

customer_reviews.title: Great product  👌
customer_reviews.text: i just received this product and the clock itself is sturdy and sleek. Perfect for my office and does not take up too much space. The camera is not visible and you can video or take pictures from your phone. I love it and hapoy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: monique tann

customer_reviews.title: The Camera in the hidden clock is dope.
customer_reviews.text: I love how discrete this little guy is.. The customer service with this company is also 5 star 100%. Fast response time, answers all your questions effectively and efficiently. Can’t go wrong with these guys or their devises.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Eklund

customer_reviews.title: My eye in the sky
customer_reviews.text: This wonderful clock camera is exactly what I needed, so I can keep an eye on my home when I am away, battery or plugin. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Lord Goku

customer_reviews.title: Quality +++++
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it, small, very discrete, easy to setup. I had to contact phone support because I was not able to connect it at first. The guy on the phone was very helpful and patience, after reviewing my network settings on my router, I found out the issue was mine, I had funny complicated characters on the WiFi name, I renamed it, then it worked right away!
customer_reviews.author: FELIPE FUENTEALBA

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The alarm clock has great functionality and the camera works as advertised. The written manual is also clear and concise. I had some issue with setup but customer service was great and the technical support team was very helpful in helping me resolve it. I would recommend this clock and this company
customer_reviews.author: Kach

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great supportq
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Does exactly what I need it to do. Peace of mind right out of the box. These guys also have great support, fast response and easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Pfeiff

customer_reviews.title: Nice little clock
customer_reviews.text: Product works well enough for the price. Clock function did not work since the set button was broken/defective but customer service resolved issue quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor P.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today but so far it's been exactly what I expected! I followed all the instructions that came included and setting everything up did not take long. I haven't tested the motion detection yet but the night vision and picture quality are not bad at all for this price! I don't think anyone would be able to tell that this is a camera and it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A

customer_reviews.title: Great little affordable camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera clock. Easy to set up. Inconspicuous design. There’s no way to tell from looking at it that is a camera. It allowed me to keep an eye on my teenagers, dogs and cheating ex while I was at work. Picture is clear enough and you can listen to audio. It says you can talk through it but I haven’t figured that out yet. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C.

customer_reviews.title: A great hidden camera!
customer_reviews.text: In addition to a clock which illuminates at night, the WB-726 is an excellent device for it keeps my bedroom and my study room safe. I feel at ease wherever I am knowing what exactly is happening around where the clock is placed. The best part of it is that no one is aware there is a camera hidden inside. Technology is great, so are the people creating it.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Le

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Use clock on my side table. Fits in with no hint of having a camera. Cannot see camera lens, cannot see lights. Catches any movement and sends alert to my cell phone. Just what I needed for my apartment because I travel around a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Clock" camera -  :)
customer_reviews.text: Awesome "clock" for the price. I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I this this camera, it was easy to set up, I'm able to see what's going on in my home while I'm at work. This was a great buy having to monitor my kids while they are home schooling.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Decent product but might as well buy a camera
customer_reviews.text: I liked the camera but setting up voice and to record is a bitch and I still haven’t figured it out. Also it doesn’t save to my sd card even though it reads that it is there.
customer_reviews.author: John Monserrat

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy customer
customer_reviews.text: Product is cheaply made. Got very hot. Was way too bright and the plugin would not stay connected. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great spy Alarm
customer_reviews.text: Just received my package and am very satisfied with it. The package was delivered with care love how easy it was to set up. The picture quality is really good like that it has night vision the motion detection is also a plus really like the product would recommend to anyone who needs this spy cam for home or any other kind of need plus it’s a clock works great.👍
customer_reviews.author: Joan Towle

customer_reviews.title: Discreet - Nice little clock / camera
customer_reviews.text: This little clock is ideal for keeping an eye on things when you are away. It is discreet and small enough to fit in the corner of any night stand, end table, dresser, book shelf, or anywhere you might normally keep a small click / alarm clock. The tech support is very responsive if you have any issues. Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: SometimesSteph

customer_reviews.title: Discreet
customer_reviews.text: Camera is what I needed. It is not easy to identify and picture quality is well. The only problem is no audio, I contacted customer service and they were prompt with their response and working to rectify this.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: This was relatively easy to set up compared to other products I've tried. It is inconspicuous and perfect for my needs. My apartment was broken into not long ago and this finally gives me the peace of mind I've desperately needed.
customer_reviews.author: ApartmentMillenial

customer_reviews.title: Camera is not noticable
customer_reviews.text: Video quality is good. Easy set up. Clock is nice and camera is not noticeable
customer_reviews.author: Troy Adams

customer_reviews.title: Priceless
customer_reviews.text: Instruction is very clear , Video quality is better than the last one I have....
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Camera clock
customer_reviews.text: The camera clock has good night vision, motion detection and the picture quality is perfect. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gennette

customer_reviews.title: Great choice to have.
customer_reviews.text: Is a great toy and i recommend it, I will definitely purchase from this seller again. Received my clock fast, easy setup. Great picture; good resolution and easy to connect to WiFi. Working great, one thing i would like to have is the option to dim the Led light.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Santana

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera.good quality and very good microphones.i would definitely recommend to anyone. Thank you pierre
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Alarm clock not cool!
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to set up and alarm clock is just weird doesn’t shut off after it goes off it sets itself daily no on or off. Instructions did not address the clock just the cam. Sent it back!
customer_reviews.author: D. Lock

customer_reviews.title: difficult to set up but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It is much smaller than I expected and the video quality is barely acceptable but, the motion sensor is very good. It is very very discreet, and although I am not very tech-savvy and had trouble with set-up, their tech team was very responsive and sharp. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Autonut

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: My clock camera wasn't recording. Called customer service which is the owner and he troubleshooted everything he could with me. After trying everything we could think of... he was happy to send me a new one for free. Awesome customer service and a very kind man.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Baughman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality discreet clock with camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for in house monitoring. Has good quality video and audio. Takes only 10 mins to set it up. Can be monitored on your phone remotely using the easy install and user friendly software. Has quick start guide and excellent customer service for support.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Works Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This clock camera is smaller than it seems in the picture but it works very well. The picture quality is good. The night vision is works ok. Overall I would recommend this spy camera
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great and Subtle
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic idea. I share an apartment and just wanted to keep an eye on my valuables when I leave for a time, and this clock is fantastic. Very subtle and useful everyday, it seems like a neat little clock, yet provides me piece of mind with a great security service.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry V.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work right
customer_reviews.text: Motion detection video : 0 Photo sometime. Only good thing it’s you can watching on line . All the time. But who go in the room NEVER !!!
customer_reviews.author: MATEO

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice little camera easy to set up and use . Just he sure to look up the how to online as there was no instructions on the box .
customer_reviews.author: francisÃÂ ross
